about_the_game:
About This Game

Digi: Cyber Angel is an innovative visual novel that explores the boundaries of creativity and technology. Created with the assistance of AI tools, this game demonstrates how indie developers can harness AI to craft compelling experiences. From stunning backgrounds to lifelike character designs, immersive music, and dynamic dialogue, every aspect of this game has been shaped using cutting-edge AI technology.

Story Overview

Step into the digital wings of Digi, a newly born angel created to bridge the growing reliance on technology with the divine. As humanity drifts further from spirituality, Digi is summoned to join the Council of Angels, a group that governs essential aspects of life and acts as a barrier between humans and a silent God.

Navigate Digi’s journey as she discovers her purpose, builds relationships with the other angels, and faces the challenges of uniting technology and faith in a fractured world. Every choice you make shapes Digi’s role and the fate of humanity.

Key Features

  • AI-Generated Assets: Experience breathtaking visuals, immersive soundscapes, and rich storytelling, all crafted using AI, showcasing the potential for indie developers to break new ground.

  • Engaging Storyline: A unique narrative combining elements of faith, technology, and humanity’s evolving needs, with branching paths and multiple endings.

  • Dynamic Characters: Interact with a diverse cast of angels, each representing a different facet of existence, from the Angel of Knowledge to the Angel of Community.

  • Choice-Driven Gameplay: Your decisions influence relationships, plot outcomes, and the balance between humanity and the divine.

  • Innovative Worldbuilding: Explore the Hallowed Reach, a mystical rift connecting Heaven and Earth, and uncover secrets about the divine realm.

Digi: Cyber Angel is not just a game; it’s a showcase of how AI can empower creators to bring ambitious ideas to life. Whether you’re a fan of visual novels or curious about the potential of AI in game development, this title offers a fresh perspective on storytelling and creativity.

content_descriptors.notes: Uh I'm still working on the game, but It might get edgy I'm not sure where the AI will take it

name: Digi: Cyber Angel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 10(64bit)/11(64bit)
  • Processor: intel® Core™ i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound device

short_description: Digi: Cyber Angel is a visual novel where you play as Digi, a newly born angel joining a council to balance humanity's reliance on technology and divine forces. Make choices that affect relationships, plot, and the fate of both heaven and earth in this branching narrative.
